name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】ねぽらぼ学園 ☆5周年記念！！輝く学寮祭☆【#ねぽらぼ5周年学祭3Dライブ】 [-7fWewjcygo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: The members of NePoLaBo (Lamy, Polka, Botan, and Nene) are in a classroom setting, brainstorming ideas for their 5th-anniversary school festival performance.
Transition from the classroom to the live stage as the audience cheers and the music starts.
Performance of the song 'Kimemaster!!' (キメマスター！！).

subtitles.original: 売れるって
subtitles.english: It'll sell.

subtitles.original: なんでラミィだけ泳がされる前提なのよっ！
subtitles.english: Why am I the only one expected to go for a swim?!

subtitles.original: ……いや、まだ終わってない！ 学寮祭はお昼から……
subtitles.english: ...No, it's not over yet! The school festival is from noon...

subtitles.original: ほんのちょっとだけ、まだ時間はある！
subtitles.english: There's just a little bit of time left!

subtitles.original: よし、とりあえず案を出してみよっか
subtitles.english: Alright, let's try coming up with some ideas first.

subtitles.original: 学校の祭りといえば…… 焼きそば、じゃがバター、
subtitles.english: When it comes to school festivals... Yakisoba, jaga-butter,

subtitles.original: 唐揚げ、クレープ、ポテト……
subtitles.english: fried chicken, crepes, fries...

subtitles.original: 食べ物しかないじゃん！！
subtitles.english: That's all just food!!

subtitles.original: ……でも今から仕込みはちょっと無理かもな……
subtitles.english: ...But it might be a bit too late to start prepping now...

subtitles.original: まあできるとしたら 炎天下でカラカラな喉に染みわたる……
subtitles.english: Well, if there's one thing we can do... For parched throats under the blazing sun,

subtitles.original: ラミィ水！！
subtitles.english: Lamy Water!!

subtitles.original: これは売れるぞ～
subtitles.english: This is gonna sell~

subtitles.original: やめろぉぉぉ！！！
subtitles.english: Stop it!!!

subtitles.original: うっひょおぉぉ！しぼり出して～
subtitles.english: Whoa! Squeeze it out~

subtitles.original: バカなこと言ってないで！ もっと真面目に考えなさいって！
subtitles.english: Stop talking nonsense! I'm telling you to think more seriously!

subtitles.original: そんなに言うならラミィちゃんは何がいいの？
subtitles.english: If you're going to say all that, what do you want to do, Lamy-chan?

subtitles.original: ラミィ？そうだなぁ… やっぱり歌は歌いたいし、
subtitles.english: Me? Well... I definitely want to sing,

subtitles.original: バンドとか、かな？
subtitles.english: so maybe a band or something?

subtitles.original: ふつう
subtitles.english: Standard.

subtitles.original: ひねりがないな～い
subtitles.english: No twists there~

subtitles.original: ……フッ
subtitles.english: ...Hmph.

subtitles.original: こいつら……！
subtitles.english: These guys...!

subtitles.original: でもまあ、歌はいいかもね～
subtitles.english: But well, singing might be good~

subtitles.original: ショート動画用にいろいろな曲練習してるし、 その中から何かやってみる？
subtitles.english: We've been practicing various songs for short videos, so should we try one of those?

subtitles.original: じゃあねね、あれやりたい！！ 元気いっぱいの、ねねたちにピッタリなやつ！！
subtitles.english: Then Nene wants to do that one!! The high-energy one that's perfect for us!!

subtitles.original: あ～～～あれね！
subtitles.english: Ah~~~ that one!

subtitles.original: いいんじゃなーい！
subtitles.english: That sounds good!

subtitles.original: じゃ、とりあえずやってみますか！
subtitles.english: Well then, let's give it a try for now!

subtitles.original: キメマスター！！
subtitles.english: Kimemaster!!

subtitles.original: 前人未到の未踏地だよなぁ
subtitles.english: It's an unprecedented, unexplored land

subtitles.original: そいゃー！
subtitles.english: Soiya!

subtitles.original: キメマスター！！ 作詞・作曲：田代智一
subtitles.english: Kimemaster!! Lyrics/Composition: Tomokazu Tashiro

subtitles.original: 生まれ変わる一歩目は
subtitles.english: The first step to being reborn is

subtitles.original: 一歩目が大事さ 恐れないで
subtitles.english: The first step is important, don't be afraid

subtitles.original: 何度でも平気な顔で走り出して
subtitles.english: Start running time and again with a straight face

subtitles.original: 行かなきゃ！上々の気分さ
subtitles.english: Got to go! Feeling great

subtitles.original: やってみたいことには欲張りだね
subtitles.english: I'm greedy for things I want to try

subtitles.original: 欲張りごめんね 直さないよ
subtitles.english: Sorry for being greedy, I won't change

subtitles.original: 何度でも未来を書き換えたくなるのさ
subtitles.english: It makes me want to rewrite the future over and over

subtitles.original: 行かなきゃ！最高の仲間と
subtitles.english: Got to go! With the best friends

subtitles.original: 星になろうよ 輝きたいよ
subtitles.english: Let's become stars, I want to shine

subtitles.original: 今は今だけ
subtitles.english: Now is only for now

subtitles.original: 後悔しないようにねっ
subtitles.english: So you don't have any regrets!

subtitles.original: さあおいで MONSTERS
subtitles.english: Come on, MONSTERS

subtitles.original: 暴れちゃえ MONSTERS
subtitles.english: Go wild, MONSTERS

subtitles.original: こんなにも無敵 PIKA STARS!
subtitles.english: So invincible, PIKA STARS!

subtitles.original: 夢が KIRA-KIRA
subtitles.english: Dreams are KIRA-KIRA

subtitles.original: 無駄に KIRA-KIRA
subtitles.english: Needlessly KIRA-KIRA

subtitles.original: 全進だ DOKA-DOKA!
subtitles.english: Full speed ahead, DOKA-DOKA!

subtitles.original: はわっ 通りまーす
subtitles.english: Hawa, coming through

subtitles.original: 決まっちゃってる 全速モードでよいしょっしょ
subtitles.english: It's decided, heave-ho in full speed mode

subtitles.original: 制限はね 無視だよ 何でもかんでもやっぱっぱ
subtitles.english: Ignore the limits, just do everything

subtitles.original: 全力がいいよね 決め顔あり キメ顔あり
subtitles.english: Going all out is best, showing a cool face, a determined face

subtitles.original: 最強 BIG BANG 狙っちゃえ未来！
subtitles.english: Strongest BIG BANG, aim for the future!

subtitles.original: チェストー！
subtitles.english: Chesto!

subtitles.original: 手とりあったるんたった 怖くはないよね
subtitles.english: Holding hands, skipping along, it's not scary

subtitles.original: 夢の計速メーターは 振り切れそうだよ
subtitles.english: The dream speed meter is about to max out

subtitles.original: 地球からやってきたボクらは
subtitles.english: We who came from Earth

subtitles.original: 本日も Go ahead! Go ahead!
subtitles.english: Today as well, Go ahead! Go ahead!

subtitles.original: 踊られるまで？
subtitles.english: Until we're made to dance?

subtitles.original: …怒られても止まらないのです
subtitles.english: ...Even if we get scolded, we won't stop

subtitles.original: 騒がしくて ごめんなさーい！
subtitles.english: Sorry for being so noisy!

subtitles.original: 全人類だい？
subtitles.english: All humanity?

subtitles.original: ボクらだい！
subtitles.english: It's us!

subtitles.original: いわゆる前人未到の未踏地だよなぁ
subtitles.english: It's a so-called unprecedented, unexplored land

subtitles.original: そいゃー！
subtitles.english: Soiya!

subtitles.original: ゆずらないないない休日も
subtitles.english: Uncompromising holidays

subtitles.original: 百歩ゆずるなんて負けよ球団よ
subtitles.english: Giving an inch is a loss, my team

subtitles.original: ゴールへのロードは砂利と岩だらけで
subtitles.english: The road to the goal is full of gravel and rocks

subtitles.original: 泣いても顔は “に・や・り”
subtitles.english: Even if I cry, my face has a "grin"

subtitles.original: そんな時 お空は遠く澄め
subtitles.english: At such times, the sky is clear and distant

subtitles.original: だってほらあきらめたくない事が
subtitles.english: Because look, things I don't want to give up

subtitles.original: 進化して みんなを果ての果ての空へ
subtitles.english: Evolve and take everyone to the farthest sky

subtitles.original: 連れ去るボクら地球な子
subtitles.english: Taking them away, we children of Earth

subtitles.original: 憧れたんだ 星の光は
subtitles.english: I yearned for it, the starlight

subtitles.original: 消えないときめき
subtitles.english: A throb that never fades

subtitles.original: 心拍数上がりまくりっ
subtitles.english: Heart rate rising like crazy

subtitles.original: さあ跳んで MONSTERS
subtitles.english: Come on, jump, MONSTERS

subtitles.original: 暴れちゃお MONSTERS
subtitles.english: Let's go wild, MONSTERS

subtitles.original: 大胆で不敵 PIKA STARS!
subtitles.english: Bold and fearless, PIKA STARS!

subtitles.original: 夢が KIRA-KIRA
subtitles.english: Dreams are KIRA-KIRA

subtitles.original: 上昇中 つまり好調中
subtitles.english: Rising, in other words, in good shape

subtitles.original: あ サビきまーす
subtitles.english: Ah, here comes the chorus

subtitles.original: 多分勝利は 決まっちゃってる！
subtitles.english: Victory is probably decided!

subtitles.original: いいとこだったのに！
subtitles.english: It was a good part!

subtitles.original: バンドじゃないからせっせっせ カッコつけなければ
subtitles.english: Since it's not a band, we've got to pose

subtitles.original: バンドじゃないからよいよいよい カッコがつくのだよ
subtitles.english: Since it's not a band, it looks cool

subtitles.original: バカ騒ぎ
subtitles.english: Raucous party

subtitles.original: やんちゃ騒ぎ
subtitles.english: Naughty party

subtitles.original: やったもん勝ち 狙っちゃえ未来！
subtitles.english: The winner takes all, aim for the future!

subtitles.original: チェストー！
subtitles.english: Chesto!

subtitles.original: 銀河のどっかの頂点に旗を立てるまで
subtitles.english: Until we plant a flag at the peak of somewhere in the galaxy

subtitles.original: ニューなレコードの道標は続くんだってば
subtitles.english: The record-breaking trail continues, I tell you

subtitles.original: 地球からやってきたボクらよ
subtitles.english: We who came from Earth

subtitles.original: やりまくれ Go ahead! Go ahead!
subtitles.english: Do it all, Go ahead! Go ahead!

subtitles.original: Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: さあ次の星へ！
subtitles.english: Come on, to the next star!

subtitles.original: 一歩が百歩の始まり
subtitles.english: One step is the beginning of a hundred

subtitles.original: だから行こうよ すぐに行こうよ
subtitles.english: So let's go, let's go right away

subtitles.original: 無理は道理よりも強引だなー
subtitles.english: Impossible is more forceful than reason

subtitles.original: 瞬間をキミと一緒にね
subtitles.english: That moment together with you

subtitles.original: MONSTERS
subtitles.english: MONSTERS

subtitles.original: 真っ暗な空かもしれないけど ボクらは輝きたい
subtitles.english: It might be a pitch-black sky, but we want to shine

subtitles.original: お目々を開いてお目々を離すなよー！
subtitles.english: Open your eyes, and don't look away!

subtitles.original: MONSTER イェイ！ MONSTER イェイ！ MONSTER 全人類未到の宇宙に 全速の全力で Goだ Yeah!!
subtitles.english: MONSTER Yay! MONSTER Yay! MONSTER Into the space unknown to all humanity, with all our speed and power, Go Yeah!!
